Text.text: Congratulamellations! You truly exceeded all my expectations. That mossbag next door will have no choice but to admit defeat!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: What a mycological marvel you are! Together, we'll show the Bog Magician's Guild the true power of fungi!
Text.speaker: AGARICUS

Text.text: Curse you, Agaricus! You and your horrid toadstools have taken over my entire garden. There's not mushroom left for my beautiful moss...
Text.speaker: ANDREAEA
